1990 California Housing Dataset

Source: R/housing.R
housing.Rd

Home prices in California in 1990 from the California Census.

housing

Format

A data frame with 20460 rows and 10 variables.

The variables are as follows:

longitude

longitude

latitude

latitude

housing_median_age

Median age of houses in the area

total_rooms

Total # of rooms in the house

total_bedrooms

Total # of bedrooms in the house

population

population of area

households

# of households in the area

median_income

Median income of area in ten-thousands

median_house_value

Median House Value of area

ocean_proximity

Distance from Ocean

Source

The data was obtained from Kaggle California Housing Data 1990.

Examples

summary(housing)

#>    longitude         latitude     housing_median_age  total_rooms   
#>  Min.   :-124.3   Min.   :32.54   Min.   : 1.00      Min.   :    2  
#>  1st Qu.:-121.8   1st Qu.:33.93   1st Qu.:18.00      1st Qu.: 1448  
#>  Median :-118.5   Median :34.26   Median :29.00      Median : 2127  
#>  Mean   :-119.6   Mean   :35.63   Mean   :28.64      Mean   : 2636  
#>  3rd Qu.:-118.0   3rd Qu.:37.71   3rd Qu.:37.00      3rd Qu.: 3148  
#>  Max.   :-114.3   Max.   :41.95   Max.   :52.00      Max.   :39320  
#>                                                                     
#>  total_bedrooms     population      households     median_income    
#>  Min.   :   1.0   Min.   :    3   Min.   :   1.0   Min.   : 0.4999  
#>  1st Qu.: 296.0   1st Qu.:  787   1st Qu.: 280.0   1st Qu.: 2.5634  
#>  Median : 435.0   Median : 1166   Median : 409.0   Median : 3.5348  
#>  Mean   : 537.9   Mean   : 1425   Mean   : 499.5   Mean   : 3.8707  
#>  3rd Qu.: 647.0   3rd Qu.: 1725   3rd Qu.: 605.0   3rd Qu.: 4.7432  
#>  Max.   :6445.0   Max.   :35682   Max.   :6082.0   Max.   :15.0001  
#>  NA's   :207                                                        
#>  median_house_value ocean_proximity   
#>  Min.   : 14999     Length:20640      
#>  1st Qu.:119600     Class :character  
#>  Median :179700     Mode  :character  
#>  Mean   :206856                       
#>  3rd Qu.:264725                       
#>  Max.   :500001                       
#>                                       
table(housing$ocean_proximity)

#> 
#>  <1H OCEAN     INLAND     ISLAND   NEAR BAY NEAR OCEAN 
#>       9136       6551          5       2290       2658 
sum(is.na(housing$total_bedrooms))

#> [1] 207
